description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Common Log File System Driver elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-43501), it is crucial to apply the necessary updates provided by Microsoft:

1. Identify your system's current build number from the list below:
   - Windows 11 Version 24H2: 10.0.26100.2033
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2: 10.0.22631.4317
   - Windows 11 Version 22H2: 10.0.22621.4317
   - Windows 11 Version 21H2: 10.0.22000.3260
   - Windows 10 for x64-based Systems: 10.0.10240.20796
   - Windows 10 Version 22H2: 10.0.19045.5011
   - Windows 10 Version 21H2: 10.0.19044.5011

2. Download the relevant update package(s) from the links provided:
   - [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
   - [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
   - [KB5044286](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044286)
   - [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
   - [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)

3. Install the updates and restart your system to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- These updates address a vulnerability that could allow elevation of privilege through improper link resolution.
- Ensure to check the compatibility of the updates with your current system configuration before installation.

**Preconditions**:
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
- Ensure your system is up to date with its current version from Microsoft.
